basics.name: Pramiti Sarker
basics.label: Assistant Professor (Ph.D., AEP)
basics.summary: Assistant Professor in Industrial & Management Systems Engineering focusing on occupational ergonomics; multi-modal (physical + cognitive) workload assessment; applied biomechanics and EMG; ergonomic intervention design & evaluation; work-rest scheduling and sustainable human performance.
